name: Project Lambda
description:
(NOTE: this is currently only a prototype and is thus VERY unfinished and unpolished, but I would still appreciate feedback on aspects that do still need improving at this very early stage of development.)

Welcome to Project Lambda, my first major personal video game project!

Project Lambda is a digital recreation of real-life ball-in-a-maze labyrinth games, where you roll a ball through a flat plane by tilting the board, dodging holes and ensuring you can get to the goal at the end before time runs out. The faster you go and the more stuff you collect along the way, the more score you get at the end for a higher overall rank! Currently, 3 levels are available for the testing, so give them a try and have fun!
